issue.title: Add filter for imu, force torque data streams from AtlasPlugin.cc

content.raw:
Currently, we think that the IMU signals are really nice. 

Any filtering done at the 1000Hz loop should be done on the teams side, such that the team can choose their implementation  (possibly using desired joint velocity/accelerations as input to a kalman filter). If filtering can be implemented at a faster rate on the simulation side(seems unlikely), this could help however it would be nice to be able to set the parameters.

For the force torque sensors, care should be taken not to filter out spikes due the foot hitting the ground.
